channel.title: [317]HurtScape-~24/7~EVERYTHING is Coded[PI] NEED A FORUM CODER!
channel.description:
CURRENTLY BEING ADDED: [code]Dungeoneering-We have it all set, but we need to fix some bugs. Frost Dragons-We have them all coded, but we're adding the drops. More to come...[/code]
Hello, and welcome to my development thread! Take a look at all of the photos:
All the pictures you will see below are FULLY coded!:
Theiving [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs.png[/img]
Slayer [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs2.png[/img]
Sell your things here [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs3.png[/img]
Pk shop [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs4.png[/img]
Pk shop view IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs5.png[/IMG]
Korasi is added with special attack! [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs6.png[/img]
View of the korasi spec [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs7.png[/img]
God Wars [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs8.png[/img]
Dag Layer [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs9.png[/img]
KBD [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/kbd.png[/img]
Tormented Demons [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs10.png[/img]
Corporal Beast [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs11.png[/img]
Rock Crabs for excellent training [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs12.png[/img]
Monster teleports [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs13.png[/img]
Fully Coded mini-games! [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs14.png[/img]
PvP Zones [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs15.png[/img]
Skilling Area [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs16.png[/img]
Agility and Hunter [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs17.png[/img]
Working Stats [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs18.png[/img]
Donator Options [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs19.png[/img]
Magics [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs20.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs21.png[/img]
Donator Zone [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs22.png[/img]
Custom Summoning Tab [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs23.png[/img]
Different Prayers(All work) [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs24.png[/img]
::pure [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs25.png[/img]
Donator Chest [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs26.png[/img]
Custom Quest Tab [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc515/Marine5287/hs27.png[/img]
What we need is: Forums Manage-Needs to know how to code phpBB forums
Fill this application out: [code]Are you experienced?: If so, what type of experience have you had?: Can you show us any links to a forum you've made?: Is there anyone that can vouch your information that you're giving us?: Additional information we should know:[/code]
Please don't post "Post more information", because the photos pretty much say everything.

[/quote]

I can look into PhBB since they’re free, i’ll work on a forum real fast and show you to see what you think.

item.title: [317]HurtScape-~24/7~EVERYTHING is Coded[PI] NEED A FORUM CODER!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“xxifish i x, post:2, topic:397121”]seems like its a Erased-pk leech, just attempting to add dungbungfungeneering ( nightmareRH says it )
http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/317226-pi-erasedpkz-full-summoning-bob-torva-beast-combat-602-a.html or if that link isnt working go to Run3-server.0rg ( 3 = e, 0 = o) and look for the following
google > RuneScape Development > RS2 Server
Downloads and find Erased.
GG?
gl on coding if u know how to :P[/quote]

First of all, this isn’t my development, it’s my friends and I’m making this for him. And he’s a very good coder, he took Java classes. Also if he did use this, then he would add a lot.

a beginer coder hoping to become better (=
(this is in your personal text)

When you can replace “Beginner” with “Experienced” you can comment “gl on coding if u know how to :P”.

EDIT
Now that I’m looking at it, my friend did add a lot of stuff.

Read full topic
